mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderHeader.id", boh.order_num AS "orderHeader.orderNum", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.p_line_no AS "pLineNo", a.sku_shelf_id as "shelfInfo.id", -- oi.name as "shelfInfo.name", a.sku_id AS "skuInfo.id", bsi.name as "skuInfo.name", a.part_no AS "partNo", a.sku_name AS "skuName", a.unit_price AS "unitPrice", a.sent_qty as "sentQty", a.ord_qty AS "ordQty", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", su.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
left join sys_user su on a.create_id=su.id left join biz_sku_info bsi on a.sku_id=bsi.id left join biz_order_header boh on a.order_id=boh.id LEFT JOIN biz_op_shelf_sku oi on a.sku_shelf_id=oi.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_order_detail( id, order_id, line_no, p_line_no, sku_shelf_id, sku_id, part_no, sku_name, unit_price, sent_qty, ord_qty, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderHeader.id}, #{lineNo}, #{pLineNo}, #{shelfInfo.id}, #{skuInfo.id}, #{partNo}, #{skuName}, #{unitPrice}, #{sentQty}, #{ordQty}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_order_detail SET order_id = #{orderHeader.id}, line_no = #{lineNo}, p_line_no = #{pLineNo}, sku_shelf_id=#{shelfInfo.id} sku_id = #{skuInfo.id}, part_no = #{partNo}, sku_name = #{skuName}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, sent_qty = #{sentQty}, ord_qty = #{ordQty}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select max(a.line_no) from biz_order_detail a where a.order_id=#{orderHeader.id}
